body_html:
Thank you Victor @victorcampos7 for trying Tensorflow with MKL-DNN and for filing this detailed, easy to reproduce bug report. Please know that I have found at least this TF commit id (TF1.5, v1.5.0-2054-gabccb5d3cb ) and this TF commit id (v1.6.0-rc1-1587-g10cddb4268)
produced non-zero results.

Log is below: (for the v1.5 one)
mean(x): [[[[-0.105329745 -0.242625624 -0.45726034]]]...]
variance(x): [[[[0.02950803 0.0405935161 0.0426237248]]]...]
sqrt(variance(x)): [[[[0.174665481 0.203944862 0.208862931]]]...]
sqrt(mean(x)^2): [[[[0.109974332 0.244677722 0.458352506]]]...]

for the v1.6 one:
mean(x): [[[[-0.253690451 0.0252816677 -0.101222448]]]...]
variance(x): [[[[0.0222420059 0.0317621827 0.0308733471]]]...]
sqrt(variance(x)): [[[[0.152453288 0.181003273 0.178531066]]]...]
sqrt(mean(x)^2): [[[[0.255653769 0.0404865742 0.106047086]]]...]

I suggest trying this TF commit id: abccb5d

Please let us know if you still have issues!

body:
Thank you Victor @victorcampos7 for trying Tensorflow with MKL-DNN and for filing this detailed, easy to reproduce bug report. Please know that I have found at least this TF commit id (TF1.5, v1.5.0-2054-gabccb5d3cb ) and this TF commit id (v1.6.0-rc1-1587-g10cddb4268)
produced non-zero results. 

Log is below: (for the v1.5 one)
mean(x): [[[[-0.105329745 -0.242625624 -0.45726034]]]...]
variance(x): [[[[0.02950803 0.0405935161 0.0426237248]]]...]
sqrt(variance(x)): [[[[0.174665481 0.203944862 0.208862931]]]...]
sqrt(mean(x)^2): [[[[0.109974332 0.244677722 0.458352506]]]...]

for the v1.6 one:
mean(x): [[[[-0.253690451 0.0252816677 -0.101222448]]]...]
variance(x): [[[[0.0222420059 0.0317621827 0.0308733471]]]...]
sqrt(variance(x)): [[[[0.152453288 0.181003273 0.178531066]]]...]
sqrt(mean(x)^2): [[[[0.255653769 0.0404865742 0.106047086]]]...]

I suggest trying this TF commit id: abccb5d3cb45da0d8703b526776883df2f575c87 

Please let us know if you still have issues!
